abilities.name: healer
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of curing each adjacent ally of any major status ailment after each turn.

abilities.name: anticipation
abilities.effect: Notifies all trainers upon entering battle if an opponent has a super-effective move, self destruct, explosion, or a one-hit KO move.

abilities.name: magic-bounce
abilities.effect: Reflects most non-damaging moves back at their user.
